title: Preserve cancellation state in task context across executor and actor-style hops
feature: cancellation propagation and task-context lowering invariants

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: current task-context cancellation state is preserved across await suspend and resume boundaries
executor and actor-style hop lowering may change executor identity but must not replace the current task cancellation slot
post-hop cancellation queries read the same task-local cancellation state as pre-hop queries
runtime_assertions: can06_preserve_task_context returns 1 when hop sequence completes
cancellation query result before hops equals result after hops

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized hop lowering preserves cancellation-state continuity in current task context
optimization does not convert executor or actor-style hops into context-breaking calls
task-context query behavior around hop boundaries remains equivalent to -O0
runtime_assertions: optimized lowering does not introduce cancellation-state mismatches across hops

abi_field_stability.stability_property: cancellation state remains task-local metadata across suspension, executor hops, and actor-style hops
executor identity transitions retain the same current-task cancellation metadata handle
